Lady Deathstrike (Yuriko Oyama), occasionally spelled "Deathstryke," is a 
fictional supervillain appearing in American comic books published by Marvel 
Comics. She is a foe of the X-Men, especially Wolverine. Her father Lord Dark 
Wind created the adamantium-bonding process that was forced on Wolverine by 
Weapon X. A ..... Lady Deathstrike has also appeared in Ultimate X-Men.
